channel.title: TuT Island?
channel.description: Is there a TuT on making tutorial island fully working? I searched for it, but it came up with a bogus Topic.. Anyone know? Thanks

item.title: TuT Island?
item.dc:creator: @soadfreek409 soadfreek409
item.description:
@soadfreek409 wrote:

[quote=“Fr33sc4p3, post:12, topic:81986”]Im not looking for a fight either, i am simply saying if more people learnt (the whole meaning of moparscape is to learn tbh) it wouldnt have such a bad name.[/quote]I know, but some people might learn easier with someone more experienced helping them as well…

item.title: TuT Island?
item.dc:creator: @soadfreek409 soadfreek409
item.description:
@soadfreek409 wrote:

[quote=“Fr33sc4p3, post:10, topic:81986”]Im disturbed because im telling you to learn java before you post retarded questions in the future? gtfo pls[/quote]Look I’m not going to fight online it’s the most ridiculous and mentally challenged thing you can do online… I just wanted to know if there was a TuT for making TuT Island work. You don’t run Moparscape… If they want to add a thread where people can get TuTs and ask questions I praise them because I don’t feel like learning a bunch of Java at the moment. I just my server to run and then I’ll learn it to fix the holes in my server. But, you can’t be mad at people who just want help… It’s kinda sad you feel that people should learn a bunch of java coding to add little things to thier servers.

Read full topic

item.title: TuT Island?
item.dc:creator: @soadfreek409 soadfreek409
item.description:
@soadfreek409 wrote:

To: Brendan

Well I don’t want it to be exactly like RuneScape. If that’s what you’re pointing towards. I just want everything to work like skills, specials, and quests. That way I can actually have an economy in my server instead of everyone having 2.174billion gp in 10 mins… To me, that’s boring and defeats the whole purpose of having skills in the first place… You don’t even need them when you can cut a tree and get tons of gp.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 19, 2007, 10:04:38 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Fr33sc4p3, post:8, topic:81986”][quote author=soadfreek409 link=topic=120478.msg1181754#msg1181754 date=1177016117]
I know, but I didn’t even really want it I just want to fix up my server to be close to actual Runescape with all the added fun of Mopar thrown in hehe.

UPDATE
Also, part of learning is getting help and time… People learn more easily if people can help them with some stuff then they start remembering and knowing how coding works…
[/quote]
Read my sig, click the link[/quote]Fr33sc4p3,
You are a deeply disturbed person… Lol. I’m pretty sure some people do not want to learn java and instead just get some quick help to get thier server up and running. I mean, sure, people should at least look into learning the basics. But, all people are different you can’t be angry at everyone who unknowingly disagrees with your opinions.

Read full topic
